GRI 102-9Supply chainSupply Chain Policy
Wynn Resorts recognizes the vital contributions of Minority-owned and Women-
owned Business Enterprises (MWBEs) to the economies of the nation, the 
state, and the community, as well as our Company. Our supplier diversity policy 
objectives are:
•  Actively and routinely seek out qualified MWBEs that can provide high-     
    quality commodities and services in a competitive market. 
•  Encourage major suppliers to Wynn Resorts who are not MWBEs to support
    diversity in their operations. 
•  Seek opportunities to support the development and competitiveness of 
    MWBEs through instruction, mentoring, and other outreach activities.
